name: Fish House Punch With Lime
recipeIngredient: 4 cups lime juice about 32 limes, chilled
2 cups lemon juice about 12 lemons, chilled

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the lemon and lime juices into a large punch bowl. Add the brown sugar and gently stir until dissolved. Slowly add the rums and the brandy, stirring constantly. Slip in a large block of ice and chill for at least an hour, stirring occasionally. Add ice if necessary.
